title: Amber Tamblyn | Amber Says What: The Cats Movie, Sharon Stone on Bumble
description:
Late Night writer Amber Ruffin recaps what's happening in pop-culture news.

Then, Amber Tamblyn talks about her book Era of Ignition, the effects of having women in power and being a parent in the Trump era.

She also speaks to Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
